name: Over and Out (Daxic, Tollona, NuLynxGames, Karlo5o)
name_original: Over and Out (Daxic, Tollona, NuLynxGames, Karlo5o)
description:
Get ready for an out-of-this-world adventure that will test your strategic skills to the limit! In this game, you play as an astronaut stranded on Mars, with the only hope of survival being to build a spaceship and escape back to Earth. To achieve this, you'll need to manage your resources carefully, gathering them from laboratory generators and upgrading your equipment through a challenging perception-based minigame. Can you stay one step ahead of the elements and build a spaceship that will carry you to safety?

How to play:

To play the game, follow these simple steps:

  1. Press the spacebar to stop the moving part of the vertical bar.
  2. Check the position of the moving part and decide which action to take:
    • If the moving part is on a card, click on it to use the card and gain resources or upgrades for your spaceship.
    • If the moving part is on the top part of the bar, click to add oxygen to your supply and prevent your astronaut from suffocating.
    • If the moving part is on the bottom part of the bar, click to reset the deck of cards and get new ones.
    • If the moving part is in the blank space between the cards, you will lose energy.
    • If you can't afford the card, nothing will happen.
  3. Once you use a card, its effect will take place, and the card will be dismissed from your deck.
  4. To get new cards, you can either:
    • Stop the moving part at the bottom of the bar to reset the deck and get new cards.
    • Wait until the time is up (displayed above the bar), and only missing cards will be drawn.

Follow these steps to collect resources, upgrade your spaceship, and avoid running out of oxygen before you're ready to blast off from Mars!
